system.description:
Shadow-veiled alchemical apothecaries, compassionate herbalist healers, or beakmasked disease cultists who harness the power of science.

Weapons: Stiletto, rapier, needle whip, dart

Armor: Leather armor

Hit Points: 1d6 per level

Languages. You know 2 additional common languages.

Mask Infusion. Inhale one premade herbal elixir from your mask for prevention or cure. Lasts all day, expires on use.

Mesmirize Insect. 1/day, you use a bewitching insect lure to automatically deliver an injection elixir to a target within near range via sting or bite.

Elixirs. You can craft elixirs with varied delivery methods. It takes an action and an INT check to craft your choice, adding the delivery method bonus to your die roll. (See @UUID[Compendium.unnatural-selection.documents.JournalEntry.4G9LZfiREUuQViCf.JournalEntryPage.pner3NgfU4oKKvjT]{Delivery Method} table).If you fail, you can’t make that elixir again until you rest. Except for mask infusions, elixirs expire in 5 rounds. Critical success increases DC or die category by one. Critical fails self-inflict harmful elixers.

You can use the table on pg. 27 of Cursed Scroll #2 to craft more elixirs. These poisons require a DC 14 INT check. Refer to the “use” column for the delivery method modifier. Note the commonality of the ingredients and check with your GM to ensure availability.
